entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • StringBuilder with Interpolated String is malformatted #55927
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to `object` #55923
    17.0
  • Ruleset setting takes precedence over .editorconfig #55920
  • `T ?? null` could be lowered to `T` where `T` is a reference type #55919
  • Type inference with method groups does not support variance for signatures with ref parameters #55909

Closed

  • ERROR: InsertNodesBefore: The item specified is not the element of a list (Only with ExpressionSyntax) #55932
  • 'Extract interface' refactoring should follow 'using directive placement' code style #39786
    Backlog
  • Extract Base Class puts usings in the wrong spot when usings inside namespace #55746
    17.0
  • How to get some nodes like the Roslyn syntax visualizer in Visual Studio? #55376
    17.0
  • Cannot find Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll -- for some people in the same build system #53656
    17.0
  • Can Roslyn Analyzers be used to analyze .NET Framework (4.8)? #55435
    17.0
  • Remove LangVer=Preview restriction from `CSharpGeneratorDriver` #54373
    17.0
  • Move to type to file duplicates attribute #55544
    17.0
  • Assert failure: Unexpected value 'LessDerived' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.MemberResolutionKind' #52701
    17.0
  • Test plan for Global Using Directive feature #51307
    17.0
  • c# Incorrect var nullability #55917
  • Remove LangVersion=preview restriction from incremental source generators #55848
    17.0
  • "Enable full solution analysis" is not available via Quick Launch #16014
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce CSharpFormattingOptions2 .cctor IL size/JIT compile time #55935
    Area-IDE
  • Move more code to async gotodef helpers #55929
    Area-IDE
  • Implement SpillSequenceSpiller.VisitMakeRefOperator. #55928
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid calling DefineUserDefinedStateMachineHoistedLocal for fields without long-lived local slot. #55922
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers
  • Freeze semantics for all branches when asked #55910
    Area-IDE
  • Add File.Exists check when renaming a file as part of InlineRename #55908
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55687
    Area-IDE
  • Fix support for "Usings inside namespaces" in various places #55795
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55930
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Pass frozen document correctly #55911
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove top level attributes on MoveTypeToFile #55900
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add telemetry for reasons on why `TryApplyChanges` fails in a workspace #55901
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move Static Members: Refactor moved member references #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Include edit session runtime capabilities in telemetry data #55898
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Revert changes to analysis scope to make RPS happy #55924
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously - and use in 'add nuget reference' code action #55759
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust asserts in OverloadResolutionResult.ReportDiagnostics. #55899
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55889
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55926
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract async navigation portions of https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/55635 #55891
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Test GetSpeculativeAliasInfo for a global alias. #55897
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective, Next
  • Inline hints not updating immediately #55080
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55915
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove langver == preview restriction for incremental generators #55866
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55912
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Disabled diff margin in cocoa quickfix preview. #55882
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Set resources correctly on CopyRefAssembly #55893
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55936
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Warm up ImportCompletion cache in background when opening a document #55729
    Area-IDE
  • Experimentation options #55902
    Area-IDE
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Enable VSTHRD200 (Use 'Async' suffix for async methods) #51812
    Area-IDE
  • Add an option to let user could change the position of Inheritance Margin #55674
    Area-IDE
  • Track completion of ProjectCacheService operations #47902
    Area-IDE
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Hold onto the TextBufferContainer for a ITextBuffer weakly #53245
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Use Auto Prop analyzer bails out for all attributes #55872
    Area-IDE
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC
  • Ensure synthesized attribute definitions are emitted for lambda and local function signatures #55873
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow fully oblivious types to coexist with nullable-aware base types in partial classes #55861
    Area-Compilers
  • Show destination name #55650
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Move the bulk of the work for rename after apply to be off the UI thread #55878
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of raw string literals #54789
    Area-Compilers
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new high memory events for releasing Roslyn caches #54850
    Area-IDE
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Add generator driver cache to VBCSCompiler #55023
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Implement metadata reference provider #55052
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
